name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior Field Engineer with extensive experience in high-performance application delivery and a solid foundation in Electrical, Mechanical, and Electronic systems. Proven ability in Fault finding and Repairs, showcasing strong Problem-solving skills while maintaining outstanding Customer service. Adept in the utilization of **Salesforce** for effective client management and sales strategies. Well-acquainted with deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and navigating compliance standards. Proven track record in AI/ML platforms to drive automation and enhance operational efficiency.
